bit.name: try to stay still when crouched
crouch when in line of fire

value.name: max vision distance
value.tooltip: maximum range of sight

value.name: central vision angle
value.tooltip: horizontal angle within which we see targets out to our maximum range

value.name: max vision angle
value.tooltip: maximum horizontal angle within which we see targets at range

value.name: peripheral vision angle
value.tooltip: maximum horizontal angle within which we can see targets out of the corner of our eye

value.name: peripheral distance
value.tooltip: maximum range at which we can see targets our of the corner of our eye

value.name: standing gun offset
value.tooltip: offset of gun from feet when standing (x=forward, y=left, z=up)

value.name: crouching gun offset
value.tooltip: offset of gun from feet when crouch (x=forward, y=left, z=up)

value.name: hearing distance
value.tooltip: maximum range at which sounds can be heard

value.name: notice projectile chance
value.tooltip: random chance of noticing a dangerous enemy projectile (e.g. grenade)

value.name: notice vehicle chance
value.tooltip: random chance of noticing a dangerous vehicle

value.name: combat perception time
value.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are already in combat or searching for them

value.name: guard perception time
value.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we have been alerted

value.name: no
value.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are not alerted

value.name: dive into cover chance
value.tooltip: chance of running a dive animation when moving into cover

value.name: emerge from cover chance
value.tooltip: chance of running an emerge animation when uncovering a target

value.name: dive from grenade chance
value.tooltip: chance of running a dive animation when moving away from a grenade

value.name: glass ignorance chance
value.tooltip: chance of not noticing that breakable surfaces have been destroyed

value.name: stationary movement dist
value.tooltip: movement distance which is considered 'stationary' for considering whether we crouch

value.name: fre
value.tooltip: distance which we allow sidestepping for flying units

value.name: begin moving angle
value.tooltip: we must be facing this close to our target before we start applying the throttle (default

value.name: maximum aiming deviation
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our weapon

value.name: maximum looking deviation
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head

value.name: noncombat look delta L
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when not in combat

value.name: noncombat look delta R
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when not in combat

value.name: combat look delta L
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when in combat

value.name: combat look delta R
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when in combat

value.name: idle aiming range
value.tooltip: range in which we select random directions to aim in

value.name: idle looking range
value.tooltip: range in which we select random directions to look at

value.name: event look time modifier
value.tooltip: multiplier for how long we look at interesting events (zero = unchanged)

value.name: noncombat idle facing
value.tooltip: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when not in combat

value.name: noncombat idle aiming
value.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when not in combat

value.name: noncombat idle looking
value.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when not in combat

value.name: guard idle facing
value.tooltip: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when guarding

value.name: guard idle aiming
value.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when guarding

value.name: guard idle looking
value.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when guarding

value.name: combat idle facing
value.tooltip: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when searching or in combat

value.name: combat idle aiming
value.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when searching or in combat

value.name: combat idle looking
value.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when searching or in combat

value.name: unreachable danger trigger
value.tooltip: danger level of an unreachable enemy which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time

value.name: vehicle danger trigger
value.tooltip: danger level of a vehicle-based enemy which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time

value.name: player danger trigger
value.tooltip: danger level of an enemy player which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time

value.name: danger trigger time
value.tooltip: how long it takes for an unopposable enemy that has the above danger level to trigger a retreat

value.name: friends killed trigger
value.tooltip: if this many of our friends are killed by an unopposable enemy, we trigger a retreat (zero = never use this as a retreat condition)

value.name: friends retreating trigger
value.tooltip: if this many of our friends are retreating from an unopposable enemy, we retreat as well (zero = never use this as a retreat condition)

value.name: retreat time
value.tooltip: how long we retreat from an unopposable enemy for

value.name: cowering time
value.tooltip: how long we hide in cover after being panicked

value.name: friend killed panic chance
value.tooltip: chance of panicking when we see a friend killed near us and the enemy is looking at us too

value.name: leader type
value.tooltip: if we see a friend of this type killed we have a chance of panicking

value.name: leader killed panic chance
value.tooltip: chance of panicking when we see a leader killed

value.name: panic damage threshold
value.tooltip: panic if we take this much body damage in a short period of time

value.name: surprise distance
value.tooltip: the distance at which newly acknowledged props or weapon impacts are considered 'close' for surprise purposes

value.name: hide behind cover time
value.tooltip: how long we stay behind cover after seeking cover

value.name: hide targe
value.tooltip: if this is non-zero then we will only seek cover if our target has not been visible recently

value.name: hide shield fraction
value.tooltip: elites and jackals only seek cover if their shield falls below this value

value.name: attack shield fraction
value.tooltip: elites and jackals only come out from cover to attack if they have this much shields

value.name: pursue shield fraction
value.tooltip: elites and jackals only come out from cover to pursue if they have this much shields

value.name: attacking crouch threshold
value.tooltip: when in attacking mode, if our crouch type is based on shields, we crouch when our shields are below this number; if our crouch type is based on danger, we crouch when our danger is above this number

value.name: defending crouch threshold
value.tooltip: when in defending mode, if our crouch type is based on shields, we crouch when our shields are below this number; if our crouch type is based on danger, we crouch when our danger is above this number

value.name: min stand time
value.tooltip: minimum time to remain standing (zero = default)

value.name: min crouch time
value.tooltip: minimum time to remain crouching (zero = default)

value.name: defending hide time modifier
value.tooltip: how much longer we hide behind cover for when in the defending state (zero = unchanged)

value.name: attacking evasion threshold
value.tooltip: when in attacking mode, we consider seeking cover or evading when our danger gets this high

value.name: defending evasion threshold
value.tooltip: when in defending mode, we consider seeking cover or evading when our danger gets this high

value.name: evasion see
value.tooltip: chance of seeking cover (otherwise we just evade)

value.name: evasion delay time
value.tooltip: minimum time period between evasion moves

value.name: max see
value.tooltip: maximum distance we will consider going to find cover (zero = default)

value.name: cover damage threshold
value.tooltip: how much damage we must take before we are allowed to seek cover (zero = always allowed to)

value.name: stalking discovery time
value.tooltip: if our target sees us for this long while we are stalking them, our cover is blown and we do something else (zero = never stop stalking)

value.name: stalking max distance
value.tooltip: distance outside of which we don't bother stalking

value.name: stationary facing angle
value.tooltip: angle outside of which we must abandon a stationary facing direction and suffer any penalties

value.name: chang
value.tooltip: how long we must stand up for after changing our fixed stationary facing

value.name: uncover delay time
value.tooltip: time to look at target's position after it becomes visible

value.name: target search time
value.tooltip: time we search at target's position

value.name: pursui
value.tooltip: time we search at a pursuit position

value.name: num positions coord
value.tooltip: number of pursuit positions to check when in coordinated group search mode

value.name: num positions normal
value.tooltip: number of pursuit positions to check when in normal search mode

value.name: melee attack delay
value.tooltip: how long we must wait between attempting melee attacks

value.name: melee fudge factor
value.tooltip: fudge factor that offsets how far in front of the target we start our attack (negative = we try to time our attack so that we go _through_ the target). this should be close to zero, but might be bigger for suiciding units

value.name: melee charge time
value.tooltip: how long we can stay in the charging state trying to reach our target before we give up

value.name: melee leap range
value.tooltip: we can launch leaping melee attacks at targets within these ranges (zero = can't leap)

value.name: melee leap velocity
value.tooltip: how fast we spring at targets when launching a leaping melee attack

value.name: melee leap chance
value.tooltip: chance of launching a leaping melee attack at a ground-based target (we always leap at flying targets)

value.name: melee leap ballistic
value.tooltip: fraction that controls how ballistic our leaping melee trajectory is

value.name: berserk damage amount
value.tooltip: amount of body damage in a short time that makes us berserk

value.name: berserk damage threshold
value.tooltip: how low our body health must get before we will consider berserking

value.name: berserk proximity
value.tooltip: if we ever get this close to a target, we berserk

value.name: suicide sensing dist
value.tooltip: when we are this close to a target, we check to see if they're getting away and if so blow up

value.name: berserk grenade chance
value.tooltip: chance of berserking when we have a dangerous projectile stuck to us

value.name: guard position time
value.tooltip: time after which we decide to change guard positions (zero = never)

value.name: combat position time
value.tooltip: time after which we change combat firing positions

value.name: old position avoid dist
value.tooltip: distance we try and stay from our last discarded firing position

value.name: friend avoid dist
value.tooltip: distance we try and stay from any friends

value.name: noncombat idle speech time
value.tooltip: time between idle vocalizations when we are not in combat

value.name: combat idle speech time
value.tooltip: time between idle vocalizations when we are in combat or searching
